p: To determine the period of A(H1N1)-influenzaâ€“related media coverage in France, we only examined articles from two national newspapers available in two online databases, but no local newspaper coverage, thereby probably underestimating the overall coverage of this period. However, first, because our objective was not to quantify media coverage but to determine the trend and identify the period of most intense media coverage, we considered that examination of only two national daily newspapers was sufficient; second, the comparison with weekly television-news time ( http://inatheque.ina.fr) devoted to A(H1N1) indicated the same media period (data not shown).
